mapper.sql: select id, course_id, place_id, sign_time, status, student_id, user_id, money, remarks from tt_student_sign
mapper.select: select a.*,b.name studentName,c.name courseName,d.name coachName,e.name placeName from tt_student_sign a left join tt_student b on a.student_id=b.id left join tt_course c on a.course_id = c.id left join tt_coach d on a.user_id = d.id left join tt_place e on a.place_id = e.id where b.parent_tel=#{tel} order by sign_time desc
